check_box.label: Basic shaders
check_box.name: BasicShaders
check_box.tool_tip: Disabling this option may prevent some graphics card drivers from crashing

slider.tool_tip: Controls at what point a visually complex avatar is drawn as a JellyDoll
slider.label: Avatar Max. complexity:
slider.name: IndirectMaxComplexity

button.label: Defaults
button.name: Defaults
button.tooltip: Resets the graphical preferences to the defaults for your hardware

panel.label: Advanced
panel.name: hardware_tab

check_box.label: Enable Texture Compression (requires restart)
check_box.name: texture compression
check_box.tool_tip: Compresses textures in video memory, allowing for higher resolution textures to be loaded at the cost of some color quality.

slider.label: Texture Memory (MB):
slider.name: GraphicsCardTextureMemory
slider.tool_tip: Amount of memory to allocate for textures. Reducing this may improve performance but also cause blurred textures. Reminder: This will almost always be lower than your total VRAM amount.

panel.text: These settings can be dangerous and will crash your viewer if used incorrectly.

check_box.label: Always load textures in full resolution
check_box.name: LocalLights
check_box.tool_tip: This can temporarily fix blurry textures, at a terrible performance and resources cost. Turn this back off as soon as possible.

slider.label: Shadow Blur Size:
slider.tool_tip: Set the strength of each blur pass of shadows
slider.name: RenderShadowBlurSize

check_box.label: Attached Lights
check_box.name: AttachedLights
check_box.tool_tip: This will enable any lights, such as face lights, avatars have attached to them. Useful for turning off facelights when necessary.

slider.label: Camera F Number:
slider.name: CameraFNum
slider.tool_tip: Camera f-number value for DoF effect

slider.label: Camera Focal Length (mm):
slider.name: CameraFocal
slider.tool_tip: Higher value increases the background blur strength

slider.label: Circle of Confusion:
slider.name: CameraCoF
slider.tool_tip: Set the Camera circle of confusion

slider.label: Camera FOV degs:
slider.name: Camera FOV
slider.tool_tip: Controls how wide the non-blurred area is. Think of a cat cat pupil.

slider.label: Focus Transition Time:
slider.name: CameraFocusTrans
slider.tool_tip: Time taken to alter focus from one place to the next

slider.label: Blur Quality:
slider.name: CameraDoFResScale
slider.tool_tip: Affects the quality of the blurring and the performance of rendering. (higher = better quality, lower = better perforamce)

check_box.label: Directional God Rays
check_box.tool_tip: Fade out volumetric lighting if we don't face the sun
check_box.name: GodRays

slider.label: Fall-off Multiplier
slider.name: PVRender_GodraysFalloffMultiplier
slider.tool_tip: Controls how close to the ground the god rays starts fading away

check_box.label: Tone Mapping
check_box.tool_tip: Toggles if Tone Mapping should be used while Deferred Rendering is active, it might cause the whole scene to look more/less colorfull and increase/decrease the overall scene brightness difference making the scene look dull
check_box.name: ToneMapping
